scripts.add-publish-submodule-SAMPLE: echo --Add .publish submodule-- && ( test ! -d .publish || git rm -f .publish ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/django-react-test-1902-build.git .publish
scripts.add-dev-data-submodule-SAMPLE: echo --Add .dev-data submodule-- && ( test ! -d .dev-data || git rm -rf .dev-data ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/django-react-test-1902-dev-data.git .dev-data
scripts.add-templates-submodule-SAMPLE: echo --Add .bem/templates submodule-- && ( test ! -d .bem/templates || git rm -rf .bem/templates ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/bem-templates-react-ts-v1.git .bem/templates
scripts.postinstall-SAMPLE: echo --Run postinstall tasks-- && npm-run-all install-patches add-templates-submodule add-dev-data-submodule add-publish-submodule
scripts.django-server: echo --Start django development server-- && python manage.py runserver
scripts.django-polls-makemigrations-SAMPLE: echo --Make migrations (polls)-- && python manage.py makemigrations polls
scripts.django-polls-sqlmigrate-SAMPLE: echo --Show migration in SQL format (polls:0001)-- && python manage.py sqlmigrate polls 0001
scripts.stylelint: echo --Postcss linting-- && stylelint src/**/*.css --syntax scss && echo No postcss problems found
scripts.eslint: echo --JS source code linting-- && eslint . --ext .js,.jsx && echo No JS problems found
scripts.tslint-SAMPLE: echo --TS source code linting-- && tslint -p . --format stylish --exclude "**/*.{js,jsx}" && echo No TS problems found
scripts.lint-SAMPLE: echo --Lint all source code-- && npm-run-all stylelint eslint tslint
scripts.test-SAMPLE: echo --Run all lintings and tests-- && npm-run-all lint jest
scripts.test: echo --Run all lintings and tests-- && npm-run-all eslint stylelint
scripts.build: echo --Webpack build-- && webpack --mode production && npm run pretty-tracker
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
